TopicTitle: [0.21.x] Kerbal Crew Manifest v0.5.5.0 Released! 0.21 Compatible!!!

Articles.Content: Im so used to using this so when i pasted in the folders started the game and then "wtf where is the icon" Haha i bet there was a lot of confused people in the forums. Cheers for looking over it and making it compatible

YOU MUST UPDATE FOR 0.20!!! It seems to not work in KSP 0.20... The icon for the mod that you click (in launch/fly mode) in the top right corner is missing. Not sure if the mod itself is not working or if just the icon is not appearing.
A modder doesn't HAVE to do anything. It would be cool though as I loved the plugin!

YOU MUST UPDATE FOR 0.20!!! It seems to not work in KSP 0.20... The icon for the mod that you click (in launch/fly mode) in the top right corner is missing. Not sure if the mod itself is not working or if just the icon is not appearing.

I think it is not working, because even without the icon, you still could right click the Control pod and access it...

But now is no option...

I posted an update with a "Working" version. Everything works except for the settings persistence. There's some funky stuff going on there that I haven't figured out yet. This effects the settings menu, window position persistence, and button position persistence. I disabled the settings menu for now as well and disabled the Kerbal Permadeath option. Everything else should work as expected.

I posted an update with a "Working" version. Everything works except for the settings persistence. There's some funky stuff going on there that I haven't figured out yet. This effects the settings menu, window position persistence, and button position persistence. I disabled the settings menu for now as well and disabled the Kerbal Permadeath option. Everything else should work as expected.

U terere, thank you, thank you, thank you!
vXSovereignXv, we still can't put a Kerbin on the new seat. Will we be able for that? I imagine because is a new part, still not on the list...
The seat works differently then a command pod. The kerbal isn't "inside" the seat. They are a part that is docked to it. I'll have to look into it once I get the persistence stuff working again.
Plus the seat acts as an rover Thanks, your plugin are so usefull and saved many lives (nope) haha cheers
Awesome Sovereign, thanks for getting it working so quickly.

Thanks for the quick update!

vXSovereignXv, we still can't put a Kerbin on the new seat. Will we be able for that? I imagine because is a new part, still not on the list...

I don't advise putting that option, I don't like to magically transfer kerbals outside the ship, remember most of the people that use crew manifest use it to simulate transfering Between "Connections inside the ship", Not magically teleporting anywhere.

I would like to always use EVA to get to a seat, but that's just me, maybe include an toggle option later

The seat works differently then a command pod. The kerbal isn't "inside" the seat. They are a part that is docked to it. I'll have to look into it once I get the persistence stuff working again.

I don't like that too Lyndonguitar. But, if i create a vehicle like a plane that only have that Seat, and a command pod unmanned at start? At this point, i need always to have a maned pod to than put the pilot.

So, in this case, i prefer that my plane start with the pilot on seat!
